com.netflix.genie.web.tasks.leader

Class ClusterCheckerTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.web.tasks.GenieTask
      • com.netflix.genie.web.tasks.leader.LeadershipTask
        • com.netflix.genie.web.tasks.leader.ClusterCheckerTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ClusterCheckerTask
extends LeadershipTask
    A task which checks to see if this leader node can communicate with all other nodes in the cluster. If it can't it will keep track of which nodes it can't communicate with and perform various actions based on the number of times it can't communicate with that node. Currently (as of 3.0) this task will mark jobs as lost if they miss a certain number of checks.
    Since:
    3.0.0
